metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44923 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A null pointer dereference vulnerability exists in gpac 1.1.0 in the gf_dump_vrml_dyn_field.isra function, which causes a segmentation fault and application crash.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
